name: Jilly the Jackfish Protector
description: Artist: Laura Rafferty - Medium: Traditional Mixed Media - Year: 2021 - Have you ever seen a swarming ball of fish? Ever wonder how they manage to confuse, disorient and drive away predators with this ancient technique? Well, it might be more magical than you think! For millennia, the Protector Pod of mermaids in the deep Atlantic have trained and shown smaller fish like these Jack Fish how to join together with mermaids to create a highly effective disillusionment spell in the face of danger.
